com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.dataset
Interface ArcList

public interface ArcList

Interface that provides arc information list.

Method Summary
 boolean contains(Arc arc)
          Whether the specified arc information is held is judged.
 int getLength()
          The number of held arc information items is obtained.
 Arc item(int index)
          Arc information in a specified index position is obtained.
 

Method Detail

item

public Arc item(int index)
         throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
Arc information in a specified index position is obtained.
Parameters:
index - Index
Specify a value not less than 0 and not more than the value obtained by subtracting 1 from getLength().
Returns:
The arc information in the index position is returned.
Throws:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index value satisfies one of the following conditions:
  • The index value is negative.
  • The index value exceeds the value obtained by subtracting 1 from the number of held arc information items.

getLength

public int getLength()
The number of held arc information items is obtained.
Returns:
The number of held arc information items is returned.

contains

public boolean contains(Arc arc)
Whether the specified arc information is held is judged.
Parameters:
arc - Arc information to be judged.
Returns:
true is returned when arc information indicated by the argument is held; otherwise, false is returned.
